episode.title: Wooddell v. International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers, Local 71

turn.speaker: byron_r_white
turn.label: Justice Byron R. White
turn.text: The second case is Wooddell against International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers, No.90-967 and here, we reverse the judgment of the Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit and again, Justice Thomas took no part in the consideration or decision of the case.
